Getting Started
===============

If you'd like to create your own dataset, please follow the instructions below. If you'd like to skip ahead, see :ref:`ml4kids_and_scratch`.

This project is available on GitHub, and the Python code for generating wallpaper symmetry patterns runs entirely in the browser via Google Colab.

Repository: https://github.com/rogalj/dmref-outreach/tree/main/mlforkids/patterns/simpler_figs

Open in Google Colab:
`Click here <https://colab.research.google.com/github/rogalj/dmref-outreach/blob/main/mlforkids/patterns/simpler_figs/wallpaper_symmetry_generator.ipynb>`_


Requirements
------------

- Google account
- Google Drive access
- Internet connection
- No local installation needed
